page.title: 02TRADE(cont)
page.content: For clothing and shoes many people (43%) shopped in Rhyl and some (14%) shopped in Abergele. Of the remainder, 25% shopped in Colwyn Bay, 12% in Llandudno and the rest visited Chester, Manchester or Liverpool. For furniture, domestic appliances and durable goods, most people still shopped locally: 55% in either Rhyl, Kinmel Bay Asda or Agri Electrics in St. Asaph. Llandudno attracted 19% while the remaining 23% shopped further afield in Chester, Wrexham, Liverpool and Manchester. For other services (doctor, dentist, library, garage) all the people in the area used amenities in Abergele or Colwyn Bay.
